title: Lyft Earnings: What to Watch
text:
Lyft Inc. is set to report its quarterly earnings after the market closes Wednesday, the ride-hailing company’s third since going public in March.

By the Numbers: Analysts surveyed by FactSet project revenue will climb to $915 million in the three months ended Sept. 30 from $867 million in the second quarter. They project the net loss will narrow to $478 million from $644 million in the previous three months. Excluding interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization, analysts expect a loss of $206 million, or 71 cents a share.

...
description: Lyft is set to report quarterly earnings after the market closes, the ride-hailing company’s third since going public in March.
